start.text: We better make a profit out of this!

start_boss.text: This... is not in the job desc.

retreat.text: This going to put a dent in the budget.
There goes my employee of the month.
Yeah uhh command I think I'll take my holiday, right now, adios!

out_of_missiles.text: What? Missiles don't come cheap you know!
NO I am NOT spending another ordnance!
I didn't put all these points to ballistics and energy mount for no reason YOU KNOW?!
You do realize that's company assets flying out the ship?

engaged.text: Phew, ok remember what they taught you.
The shine isn't just for show boys!
Switch to Delta pattern. Let's see what Delta stands for.
Switch to Alpha pattern. I wonder if this'll work...
Switch to Beta pattern. See if they like that!
Switch to Charlie pattern. Eliminate the advantage.

need_help.text: I don't need help! I can handle this!
DON'T help me! this is what I'm paid for!
I think I like these odds.

pursuing.text: Company discount for the one who takes out the most ships! (T&C Applies)
No intel is getting out of this sector!

running.text: I'm so not dealing with this.
Tch, insurance won't cover this! Moving out.
Yeah uhh, command, I think I'll take my holiday right now. Please?

hull_90.text: That dent is coming out of YOUR salary if you keep that up!
Let's keep the damage to a minimum shall we crew?
And NOT another hull point lower!

hull_50.text: I suppose this'll affect my overall performance?
I SAID NOT ANOTHER HULL POINT LOWER!

hull_30.text: Let's show those dirtworms what the corps are made of!
Oh God, WHY AM I STILL ALIVE?!
I'd rather die than see those reports!
If the explosion didn't kill me then I'll kill myself.

overload.text: We pay top dollar to have that thing blown? Crap.
Capacitor's fried, aaaand so is my salary.
Alright who's in charge of flux he's getting fired out of the airlock.
I don't NEED this right now!

death.text: Least I'm not alive to see those reports eh?
Least I get to be by your side in my last moments.

victory.text: This'll go nicely in the perfomance chart.
Can I get a raise now? Pleaseee?
Definitely sharing this to Trihub Central!
Brass is going to love this! Great job command.
Always someone I can look up to command!

victory_boss.text: Looking forward to my glowing performance review!
